sections.title: How the Smile Account bonus works
content: Open a Smile Current Account between June 3 and July 31, 2025, and finalize the activation by August 18.
To earn the ‚Ç¨150 bonus, you must either deposit your salary/pension or make deposits of at least ‚Ç¨500 per month for three consecutive months by November 30, 2025.
Activation deadlines depend on when you opened the account: September 30 for June, October 31 for July, and November 30 for August.
The bonus is issued as a ‚Ç¨150 Amazon.it gift card, which can be requested by January 12, 2026.

sections.title: Important details and conditions
content: The Amazon gift card is subject to Amazon's terms and conditions, available at amazon.it/gc-legal.
The offer includes an international debit card, and is subject to approval by Findomestic Bank.
Refer to the official Findomestic Information Sheets for full financial and contractual details.

sections.title: Promotion timeline
content: The offer is valid for account openings by July 31, 2025, with activation deadlines as described above.
Bonus requests must be submitted by January 12, 2026.
